Text: Loving You Could Never Be Better:  The song was a good example of how producer Billy Sherrill had updated the sound of Jones' records, incorporating a laid back, R&B bass line.

<Text: Loving You Could Never Be Better:  "I just decided I'd do it my way, and screw 'em if they didn't like it," Jones biographer Bob Allen quotes Sherrill.>
